Schenectady.Schenectady station: Schenectady is an Amtrak intercity train station in Schenectady, New York. Passengers currently use a temporary station without ticket sales near the station site as a new station is constructed for opening in 2018. The former station, constructed in 1979 and demolished in 2017 was built under the railroad tracks with an elevator and staircase leading to a railway platform between the two tracks.
